Uses of Class
com.github.rowak.StatusCodeException

    • Uses of StatusCodeException in com.github.rowak

      Subclasses of StatusCodeException in com.github.rowak 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StatusCodeException.BadRequestException
      Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 400 status code response.
      class  StatusCodeException.ForbiddenException
      Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 403 status code response.
      class  StatusCodeException.InternalServerErrorException
      Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 500 status code response.
      class  StatusCodeException.ResourceNotFoundException
      Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 404 status code response.
      class  StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
      Thrown whenever the Aurora controller returns a 401 status code response.
      class  StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
      Thrown whenever the Aurora controlller returns a 422 status code response.

      Sets the hue of the Aurora (static/custom effects only).
      int Aurora.Rhythm.setMode(int mode)
      Writing 0 to this field sets the Rhythm's sound source to the microphone, and writing 1 to the field sets the sound source to the aux cable.
      int Aurora.State.setOn(boolean on)
      Sets the on state of the Aurora (true = on, false = off).

      Sets the saturation of the Aurora (static/custom effects only).

      Toggles the on state of the Aurora (on = off, off = on).

      (This method works with JSON data)
      Uploads a JSON string to the Aurora controller.
